title: Originality is scarce...
review: While not denying the fact that this is a solid horror film, it seems that its lack of an original idea has been overlooked.  Horror buffs will recall that Cannibal Holocaust, the gore/exploitation film, did the exact same thing twenty years earlier.   A documentary team goes in search of a cannibal tribe, only to disappear.  The film begins with a search team going to look for them, then recovering the footage, integrating both the real-time plot as well as the previous footage into the film.  Enjoy Blair Witch, but give its predecessor its due....
